script.name: plugin.piracy.viewsalvage
script.description: Piracy: View Salvage: View and repair salvaged items

line.comment: * VIEW SALVAGE by MISTER BEAR v1.05 Dec-2010
* NOTE: Salvage data is an array of salvaged (but damaged) components, stored on calling object.
* SALVAGE DATA: ARRAY( WARE 1, DAMAGE% 1, ... , WARE n, DAMAGE% n )
* IDEA: You could let the user save 50% of the cost by using materials instead of cash.
* Suggest MICROCHIPS (2-S), COMPUTER COMPONENTS (1-S), QUANTUM TUBES (5-M)
* ******* GET SALVAGE DATA, OR CREATE EMPTY ******

line.text: add custom menu info line to array
line.var: 'Salvaged components are always damaged to some extent. Before they'

line.text: add custom menu info line to array
line.var: 'can be installed in a ship you must buy the parts to repair them.'

line.text: add custom menu info line to array
line.var: 'This shows the salvaged components currently in your cargo bay.'

line.text: add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array
= create text for custom menu, left=
add custom menu heading to array
= create text for custom menu, left=
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu heading to array
add custom menu item to array

line.comment: * CALCULATE REPAIR COST from DAMAGE PERCENTAGE
* DETERMINE ITEM COLOUR BASED ON AFFORDABILITY (GREY or GREEN)

line.text: add custom menu item to array
add custom menu heading to array
add custom menu item to array

line.comment: * REMOVE WARE and DAMAGE PERCENTAGE from SALVAGE ARRAY

sval.val: Piracy: View Salvage: View and repair salvaged items
Salvaged components are always damaged to some extent. Before they
can be installed in a ship you must buy the parts to repair them.
This shows the salvaged components currently in your cargo bay.
VIEW SALVAGE by MISTER BEAR v1.05 Dec-2010
NOTE: Salvage data is an array of salvaged (but damaged) components, stored on calling object.
SALVAGE DATA: ARRAY( WARE 1, DAMAGE% 1, ... , WARE n, DAMAGE% n )
IDEA: You could let the user save 50% of the cost by using materials instead of cash.
Suggest MICROCHIPS (2-S), COMPUTER COMPONENTS (1-S), QUANTUM TUBES (5-M)
******* GET SALVAGE DATA, OR CREATE EMPTY ******
CALCULATE REPAIR COST from DAMAGE PERCENTAGE
DETERMINE ITEM COLOUR BASED ON AFFORDABILITY (GREY or GREEN)
REMOVE WARE and DAMAGE PERCENTAGE from SALVAGE ARRAY
